1.content:
#
#### ðŸ’¿ Stay Ahead Of Your Software Portfolio ðŸ’¿

7.title: Technologies
7.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| filter isNotNull(Technology)
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize `Technology Count` = countDistinct(Technology)

8.title: Processes
8.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| filter arraySize(softwareTechnologies) > 0
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize `Process Count` = count()

13.title: Libraries
13.query:
fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
| expand processId = belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| fieldsAdd softwareComponentFileName
| fieldsAdd lastColonIndex = lastIndexOf(entity.name, ":")
| fieldsAdd Type = softwareComponentType
| fieldsAdd Library = substring(entity.name, to:lastColonIndex)
| fieldsAdd Version = softwareComponentVersion
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:processId,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize libraryCount = countDistinct(Library)

14.title: Library Versions
14.query:
fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
| expand processId = belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:processId,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize libraryVersionCount = countDistinct(entity.name)

17.title: Technologies Split by Process
17.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsRename Process = entity.name
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(toTimestamp(event.eol) < now(), "ðŸŸ  Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "ðŸŸ¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null" AND isNotNull(event.latestVersion), "ðŸŸ¡ Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "âšª Undocumented", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Link = event.link
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| fields Status, Process, Technology, Edition, `Running Version` = Version, LTS = event.lts, Cycle = event.currentCycle, `Cycle Published At` = substring(event.currentCyclePublishedAt, to:10), `End of Life` = event.eol, `Max Age` = age, `Latest Version` = event.latestVersion, `Published at` = substring(event.latestVersionPublishedAt, to:10), Link, id
| sort Status ASC, Technology ASC

categoricalBarChartSettings.categoryAxisLabel: Status,Process,Technology,Edition,Running Version,Cycle Published At,Published at,id,Latest Version,Link,LTS,Cycle,End of Life

18.title: Libraries Split by Process
18.query:
fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd lastColonIndex = lastIndexOf(entity.name, ":")
| fieldsAdd Technology = softwareComponentType
| fieldsAdd Library = substring(entity.name, to:lastColonIndex)
| fieldsAdd Version = softwareComponentVersion
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
      fetch events, from: -7d
      | filter event.name == "software-management.library-info"
      | sort timestamp DESC
    ],
    sourceField:entity.name,
    lookupField:key)
| fieldsAdd `Top Vulnerability` = lookup([
      fetch events
      | filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
      | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
      | filter event.level=="VULNERABILITY"
      | sort vulnerability.davis_assessment.score DESC
      | expand softwareComponentId = affected_entities.vulnerable_components.ids
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:softwareComponentId)
| fieldsAdd `Vulnerability Score` = `Top Vulnerability`[vulnerability.davis_assessment.score]
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentVersionPublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNotNull(`Top Vulnerability`), "ðŸ”´ Vulnerable")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestStableVersion, "ðŸŸ¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion), "ðŸŸ¡ Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "âšª Undocumented", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Link = event.link
| expand id = belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| fields Status, Technology, Library, `Running Version` = Version, `Published At` = substring(event.currentVersionPublishedAt, to:10), `Latest Stable Version` = event.latestStableVersion, `Published at` = substring(event.latestStableVersionPublishedAt, to:10), Age = age, `Top Vulnerability`, `Vulnerability Score`, Licenses = event.licenses, Link, id
| sort Status DESC, `Vulnerability Score` DESC, Technology ASC, Library ASC

categoricalBarChartSettings.categoryAxisLabel: Status,Technology,Library,Running Version,Published At,Latest Stable Version,Published at,Licenses,id,Link

27.title: Operating Systems
27.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd osVersion
| fieldsAdd host = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.host
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten host, prefix:"host."
| filter in($Scope, host.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize countDistinct(osVersion)

29.title: Hosts with OneAgent
29.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| filter isNotNull(osVersion)
| fieldsAdd host = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.host
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten host, prefix:"host."
| filter in($Scope, host.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count()

51.title: Instances of Obsolete Technologies
51.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsRename Process = entity.name
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| filter toTimestamp(event.eol) < now()
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "ðŸŸ ")

52.title: Instances of Up-To-Date Technologies
52.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsRename Process = entity.name
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| filter event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null"
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "ðŸŸ¢")

53.title: Instances of Updatable Technologies
53.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsRename Process = entity.name
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| filter isFalseOrNull(toTimestamp(event.eol) < now()) AND event.currentVersion != event.latestVersion AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null" AND isNotNull(event.latestVersion)
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "ðŸŸ¡")

54.title: Hosts with Obsolete OS
54.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| filter isNotNull(osVersion)
| fieldsAdd osVersion
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| filter toTimestamp(event.eol) < now()
| fieldsAdd host = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.host
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten host, prefix:"host."
| filter in($Scope, host.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()

55.title: Hosts with Updatable OS
55.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| filter isNotNull(osVersion)
| fieldsAdd osVersion
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC

  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."

      fetch dt.entity.host
      | fieldsAdd managementZones

    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten host, prefix:"host."
| filter in($Scope, host.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "ðŸŸ¡")

65.title: Technology Distribution
65.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance, from: -15m
| fieldsRename Process = entity.name
| fieldsAdd softwareTechnologies
| expand softwareTechnologies
| parse softwareTechnologies, "'type:' LD:Technology ',edition:' LD:Edition ',version:' LD:Version"
| fieldsAdd key = concat(Technology, ":", Edition, ":", Version)
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.technology-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:key,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(toTimestamp(event.eol) < now(), "ðŸŸ  Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null" AND event.currentVersion == event.latestVersion, "ðŸŸ¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND event.currentVersion != "null" AND isNotNull(event.latestVersion), "ðŸŸ¡ Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "âšª Undocumented", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize by:{Status, Technology, Edition, Version}, count = count()
| fields Status, `Process Count` = count, Technology, Edition, Version
| sort `Process Count` DESC

66.title: Library Version Distribution
66.query:
fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
| fieldsAdd lastColonIndex = lastIndexOf(entity.name, ":")
| fieldsAdd Technology = softwareComponentType
| fieldsAdd Library = substring(entity.name, to:lastColonIndex)
| fieldsAdd Version = softwareComponentVersion
| expand processId = belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
      fetch events, from: -7d
      | filter event.name == "software-management.library-info"
      | sort timestamp DESC
    ],
    sourceField:entity.name,
    lookupField:key)
| fieldsAdd `Top Vulnerability` = lookup([
      fetch events
      | filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
      | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
      | filter event.level=="VULNERABILITY"
      | sort vulnerability.davis_assessment.score DESC
      | expand softwareComponentId = affected_entities.vulnerable_components.ids
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:softwareComponentId)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNotNull(`Top Vulnerability`), "ðŸ”´ Vulnerable")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion) AND event.currentVersion == event.latestStableVersion, "ðŸŸ¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.currentVersion) AND isNotNull(event.latestStableVersion), "ðŸŸ¡ Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "âšª Undocumented", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:processId,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize by:{Status, Technology, Library, Version}, count = count()
| fields Status, `Process Count` = count, Technology, Library, Version
| sort `Process Count` DESC

67.title: Instances of Vulnerable Libraries
67.query:
fetch dt.entity.software_component, from: -15m
| expand processId = belongs_to[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| fieldsAdd `Top Vulnerability` = lookup([
      fetch events
      | filter event.provider=="Dynatrace"
      | filter event.type=="VULNERABILITY_STATE_REPORT_EVENT"
      | filter event.level=="VULNERABILITY"
      | sort vulnerability.davis_assessment.score DESC
      | expand softwareComponentId = affected_entities.vulnerable_components.ids
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:softwareComponentId)
| filter isNotNull(`Top Vulnerability`)
| fieldsAdd pg = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:processId,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten pg, prefix:"pg."
| filter in($Scope, pg.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "ðŸ”´")

68.content:
##### Version: 1.0.0
###### Author: Thomas Contassot
###### Links:
- [GitHub](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/CustomerSuccess/tree/main/Software%20Obsolescence%20Management)
- [Request For Enhancement](https://dt-url.net/som-rfe)
###### Credits:
- [endoflife.date](https://endoflife.date) (for OS and Technology obsolescence data)
- [deps.dev](https://deps.dev) (for Library obsolescence data)
- [Dynatrace AppSec](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/secure/application-security/vulnerability-analytics/vulnerabilities) (for Vulnerability insights)

69.content:
##### Instructions
###### Installation:
1. Download from [GitHub](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/CustomerSuccess/tree/main/Software%20Obsolescence%20Management) and [upload](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/analyze-explore-automate/dashboards-and-notebooks/dashboards-new/get-started/dashboards-use#dashboards-upload) the Dashboard's JSON to visualize the results of the continuous analysis (you've probably already done that)
2. Download from [GitHub](https://github.com/dynatrace-oss/CustomerSuccess/tree/main/Software%20Obsolescence%20Management) and [upload](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/analyze-explore-automate/workflows/manage-workflows/workflows-upload) the workflow template's YAML to keep refreshing obsolescence data
3. The workflow runs by default every 2mn from 4 to 10AM, each day. To optimize the cost of the solution, you can reduce its frequency. Simply make sure it fully runs at least once a week to guarantee maximum coverage of your software inventory.
4. [Allow outbound connections](https://developer.dynatrace.com/develop/app-functions/allow-outbound-connections) to 'endoflife.date' and 'api.deps.dev' domains in the tenant's settings
5. The dashboard will show exhaustive results at the end of the first full data refresh cycle (cf. step 2). Wait up to 24h to ensure the completeness of the obsolescence analysis.
###### Usage:
- Filter the dashboard by Management Zone by defining the 'Scope' variable
- Prioritize your maintenance by vulnerability and obsolescence risk, criticity and radius of the affected software components
- Share the filtered view's URL to the responsible team so that they keep their software safe and supported
- Extend your OneAgent coverage to reduce obsolescence risks and much more
###### Update:
1. Download the new JSON files whenever a new version is published in the open source GitHub repo
2. Follow the installation instructions from the latest version
3. Remove the previous version of the Dashboard and Workflow from your tenant

71.title: Hosts missing OneAgent
71.query:
// VMWare
//from classic integration
fetch dt.entity.virtualmachine, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
| fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.vmware_datacenter]
//match with OneAgent hosts
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
| fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
| lookup [fetch dt.entity.vmware_datacenter], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
| fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
  ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
  tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
//add extension VMs
| append [ fetch `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`
  | fieldsAdd host=arrayFirst(same_as[dt.entity.host]), ipAddress=vm_ip_address, cloudTags=array()
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsadd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host." //match with OneAgent hosts
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)]
//add OneAgent VMware hosts
| append [ fetch dt.entity.host
  | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "VMWARE" AND isNull(runs_on[dt.entity.virtualmachine])
  | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.geoloc_site]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.geoloc_site], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
| dedup id
| filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
| fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown VMWare VM OS", id
| append [ // AWS
  fetch dt.entity.ec2_instance, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress=arrayConcat(if(isNotNull(localIp), array(localIp), else: array()), if(isNotNull(publicIp), array(publicIp), else: array())),
    cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.aws_credentials]), cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.aws_availability_zone]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored=not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored,"FULL", else:if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else:"CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown AWS VM OS", id
]
| append [ // GCP
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags, zone
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags), datacenter=zone
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "GOOGLE_CLOUD_PLATFORM" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.gcp_zone]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.gcp_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id, entity.name, ipAddress, monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown GCP VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Azure
  fetch dt.entity.azure_vm, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.azure_subscription]),
    cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.azure_region]

  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.azure_region], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored, "FULL", else: if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else: "CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Azure VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Hyper-V
  fetch `dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"

  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ip_address), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "HYPER_V" AND cloudType != "AZURE" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Hyper-V VM OS", id

| append [ // Nutanix
  fetch `dt.entity.nutanix:vm`, from: -15m
| filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"

  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:IpAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "AHV" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.nutanix:vm`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]

  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags)

| summarize count = count()
| fields sum = concat(count, "âš ï¸")

72.title: OS Distribution
72.query:
fetch dt.entity.host, from: -15m
| filter isNotNull(osVersion)
| fieldsAdd osVersion
| fieldsAdd result = lookup([
  fetch events, from: -7d
  | filter event.name == "software-management.os-info"
  | sort timestamp DESC
  ],
  sourceField:osVersion,
  lookupField:key
)
| fieldsFlatten result, prefix:"event."
| fieldsAdd age = now() - toTimestamp(event.currentCyclePublishedAt)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(toTimestamp(event.eol) < now(), "ðŸŸ  Obsolete")
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND event.currentVersion != event.latestVersion, "ðŸŸ¡ Updatable", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status) AND isNotNull(event.latestVersion), "ðŸŸ¢ Up-to-date", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Status = if(isNull(Status), "âšª Undocumented", else: Status)
| fieldsAdd Link = event.link
| fieldsAdd host = lookup([
      fetch dt.entity.host
      | fieldsAdd managementZones
    ],
    sourceField:id,
    lookupField:id)
| fieldsFlatten host, prefix:"host."
| filter in($Scope, host.managementZones) OR $Scope == "Tenant"
| fields Status, Host = entity.name, OS = event.os, `Running Version` = event.currentVersion, `Full Name` = osVersion, LTS = event.lts, Cycle = event.currentCycle, `Cycle Published At` = substring(event.currentCyclePublishedAt, to:10), `End of Life` = event.eol, `Max Age` = age, `Latest Version` = event.latestVersion, `Published at` = substring(event.latestVersionPublishedAt, to:10), Link, id
| sort Status ASC
| append [ // VMWare
  //from classic integration
  fetch dt.entity.virtualmachine, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.vmware_datacenter]
  //match with OneAgent hosts
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.vmware_datacenter], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  //add extension VMs
  | append [ fetch `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`
    | fieldsAdd host=arrayFirst(same_as[dt.entity.host]), ipAddress=vm_ip_address, cloudTags=array()
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsadd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host." //match with OneAgent hosts
    | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
    | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
      ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)]
  //add OneAgent VMware hosts
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "VMWARE" AND isNull(runs_on[dt.entity.virtualmachine])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.geoloc_site]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.geoloc_site], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | dedup id
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown VMWare VM OS", id
]
| append [ // AWS
  fetch dt.entity.ec2_instance, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress=arrayConcat(if(isNotNull(localIp), array(localIp), else: array()), if(isNotNull(publicIp), array(publicIp), else: array())),
    cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.aws_credentials]), cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.aws_availability_zone]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored=not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored,"FULL", else:if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else:"CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown AWS VM OS", id
]
| append [ // GCP
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags, zone
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags), datacenter=zone
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "GOOGLE_CLOUD_PLATFORM" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.gcp_zone]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.gcp_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id, entity.name, ipAddress, monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown GCP VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Azure
  fetch dt.entity.azure_vm, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.azure_subscription]),
    cloudTags=tags, datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.azure_region]
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.azure_region], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored, "FULL", else: if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else: "CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Azure VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Hyper-V
  fetch `dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], ip_address, cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ip_address), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "HYPER_V" AND cloudType != "AZURE" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Hyper-V VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Nutanix
  fetch `dt.entity.nutanix:vm`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], IpAddress, cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:IpAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "AHV" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.nutanix:vm`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Nutanix VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Oracle
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:oci:compute`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "ORACLE" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:oci:compute`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA",tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Oracle VM OS", id
]
| summarize by:{Status, `Full Name`}, count = count()
| fields Status, Count = count, `Full Name`
| sort Count DESC

    | fieldsAdd host=arrayFirst(same_as[dt.entity.host]), ipAddress=vm_ip_address, cloudTags=array()
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsadd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host." //match with OneAgent hosts

      ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)]
  //add OneAgent VMware hosts

  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown VMWare VM OS", id

  fetch dt.entity.ec2_instance, from: -15m

  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.aws_availability_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored=not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored,"FULL", else:if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else:"CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown AWS VM OS", id
]
| append [ // GCP
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags, zone
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"),
    tags=arrayConcat(cloudTags,host.tags), datacenter=zone
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND cloudType == "GOOGLE_CLOUD_PLATFORM" AND isNull(runs_on[`dt.entity.cloud:gcp:gce_instance`])
    | fieldsAdd datacenterId=belongs_to[dt.entity.gcp_zone]
    | lookup [fetch dt.entity.gcp_zone], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
    | fields id, entity.name, ipAddress, monitoringStatus="OA", tags, datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown GCP VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Azure
  fetch dt.entity.azure_vm, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host], ipAddress, cloudMonitored=isNotNull(accessible_by[dt.entity.azure_subscription]),

  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.azure_region], sourceField:datacenterId, lookupField:id, prefix:"datacenter."
  | fieldsAdd oneAgentMonitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(oneAgentMonitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(oneAgentMonitored, host.ipAddress, else:ipAddress), monitoringStatus=if(oneAgentMonitored AND cloudMonitored, "FULL", else: if(oneAgentMonitored, "OA", else: "CLOUD")),
    tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags), datacenter=datacenter.entity.name, datacenter.id=datacenterId
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Azure VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Hyper-V
  fetch `dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], ip_address, cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], sourceField:host, lookupField:id, prefix:"host."
  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))
  | fields id=if(monitored, host.id, else:id), entity.name=if(monitored, host.entity.name, else:entity.name),
    ipAddress = if(monitored, host.ipAddress, else:ip_address), monitoringStatus=if(monitored, "FULL", else:"CLOUD"), tags=arrayConcat(host.tags,cloudTags)
  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
    | filter isNotNull(monitoringMode) AND hypervisorType == "HYPER_V" AND cloudType != "AZURE" AND isNull(same_as[`dt.entity.hyperv:virtual_machine`])
    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Hyper-V VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Nutanix
  fetch `dt.entity.nutanix:vm`, from: -15m

  | fieldsAdd host=same_as[dt.entity.host][0], IpAddress, cloudTags=tags

  | fieldsAdd monitored = not(isTrueOrNull(host.isMonitoringCandidate))

    | fields id,entity.name,ipAddress,monitoringStatus="OA", tags]
  | filter matchesValue(monitoringStatus, "CLOUD")
  | fields Status = "âš ï¸ Missing OneAgent", Host = entity.name, `Full Name` ="Unknown Nutanix VM OS", id
]
| append [ // Oracle
  fetch `dt.entity.cloud:oci:compute`, from: -15m
  | filter $Scope == "Tenant" AND $IncludeMonitoringCandidates == "YES"
  | fieldsAdd host=runs[dt.entity.host][0], cloudTags=tags
  | lookup [fetch dt.entity.host | fieldsAdd isMonitoringCandidate, tags], lookupField: id, sourceField:host, prefix:"host."

  | append [ fetch dt.entity.host
